## Meeting Overview

This document presents two main analyses:

1. **Good vs Bad Counties**: Comparison of Fig 1 estimates using only good counties versus all counties, plus summary statistics comparing good and bad counties
2. **Figure 2 Specifications**: Event study results across six specifications (three controls Ã— two approaches) showing quartile-specific estimates
